articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Various Factories in Kanggye City
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Various Factories in Kanggye City
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Kanggye Winery, the Kanggye Wood Processing Factory and the Kanggye Pencil Factory in Jagang Province alive with the year end's drive.
					 He went round various places of the winery which has been successfully remodeled under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un and held a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of further glorifying the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, stepping up the construction of raw material bases to keep the production going at a high rate, and improving the quality of goods packing.
					
					 Learning the production at the wood processing factory and pencil factory which are associated with the loving care of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu for the people and the rising generation, the premier underlined the need to push forward with the work to put furniture, finishing building materials and pencil production processes on a modern basis.
					
					 He stressed the need to boost the production of furniture which are in high demand and increase the production of quality pencils true to the intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier called upon all officials of Jagang Province including the provincial people's committee to increase the production of cocoon suited to the specific conditions of the mountainous area and, at the same time, remarkably increase the production of meat and eggs at the existing stock-breeding bases and thus unconditionally carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il without fail.
					
					 Earlier, he went round the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory and took measures to continue directing big efforts to technological updating. He also called on the relevant units to satisfactorily supply electricity and raw materials needed for production.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Belgian Organization and Jordanian Personage
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Belgian Organization and Jordanian Personage
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the Belgian branch of the Korean Friendship Association and a Jordanian personage.
					 The gifts were handed to officials concerned of the DPRK respectively by Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, and the Jordanian personage on Nov. 16 and 17.

articles.title: Youth League Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Youth League Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here on Wednesday to visit Russia.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Field Guidance to Pyongyang University of Architecture Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Field Guidance to Pyongyang University of Architecture Marked
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place on Wednesday to mark the first anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's field guidance to Pyongyang University of Architecture and registration of him as honorary president of the university.
					 He visited the university on November 26, Juche 102 (2013) and highly praised it for ensuring the designs of buildings listed as national treasures on the highest level and making achievements in designing many famous structures and training talents over the past six decades and bestowed such trust and honor upon the university as allowing it to register him as its honorary president.
					
					 Learning in detail about the work at the university several times, he personally guided the designs for laying out its new buildings and renamed it "Pyongyang University of Architecture." 
					
					 Present there were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and teachers and students of the university.

articles.title: Service Personnel and People in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong Provinces Meet
articles.content:
Service Personnel and People in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong Provinces Meet
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Rallies of service personnel and people in South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces were held on Wednesday to support the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and mercilessly foil the heinous anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. and its followers.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic bodies and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life, youth and students.
					
					 The statement of the NDC of the DPRK was read out. Then the floor was taken by representatives of the KPA, workers, agricultural workers and youth students.
					
					 The speakers said service personnel and all party members and other people and youth in the provinces fully supported the statement of the NDC of the DPRK bitterly rejecting the U.S. and its followers' "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The "human rights resolution" against the DPRK is a shameless political chicanery as it was aimed to defame the dignity of the DPRK and totally obliterate everything dear to its army and the people, they said.
					
					 One can hardly find anywhere else the most advantageous socialist system in the DPRK where the genuine dignity and rights of human beings are fully ensured, they said.
					
					 They declared that they would firmly defend the socialist system of Korean-type with a full confidence in their victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed mammoth demonstrations.

articles.title: Exhibition of Scientific Achievements in Education Held
articles.content:
Exhibition of Scientific Achievements in Education Held 
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of scientific achievements in education took place at Pyongyang University of Architecture from Nov. 24 to 26.
					 Displayed there were achievements made by the teachers and researchers of the university in education and scientific researches over the past one year.
					
					 Drawing the attention of visitors were designs of service network in the Wisong Scientists Residential Quarters, those of interior of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, those for laying out the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sandong District, the design for turning the Pyongyang Folklore Park into thick woodland and greenery and the design for turning the Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Korean People's Army in Pyongyang into greenery.
					
					 Miniatures of Tabo Pagoda and dwelling houses and industrial establishments and those of their architectural formation and other teaching materials were highly estimated by the participants as they help students raise the ability to represent space and structure.
					
					 There was also a presentation of educational science during the exhibition.

articles.title: Medical Symposium on Stem Cell Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Medical Symposium on Stem Cell Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The 1st medical symposium on stem cell took place at the Pyongyang Medical College under Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK.
					 The symposium focused on such issues as separation and incubation, amplification and identification of stem cell and the application of stem cell technology. 
					
					 At least 30 papers were presented to it. What drew attention were papers on the technology of separating and incubating various kinds of stem cells from different sources, the test on the effect of stem cell transplantation and the advantages of combining stem cell with gene therapy.
					
					 There was a technical lecture after the presentation of papers.

articles.title: New Anti-rusting Paint Developed
articles.content:
New Anti-rusting Paint Developed
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A new kind of rust-removing and rust-proofing paint has been recently developed in the DPRK.
					 This paint is very effective in removing and preventing the rust and it can be painted on the surface of rusty iron, according to Ju Jong Son, director of an institute under the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry.
					
					 The nonpoisonous paint is not harmful to human body and animal.
					
					 Its consumption per square is below a fifth of the consumption of red lead and its durability is much longer than the latter.
					
					 The newly-developed paint's drying time is 30 minutes and it can be used even in a subzero temperature. It also has a strong insulation resistance.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar Hits at S. Korean Regime's Pro-American Policy
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar Hits at S. Korean Regime's Pro-American Policy
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities agreed to indefinitely extend the transfer of the right to the wartime operation control (OPECON), which had been scheduled by 2015.
					 In this regard, Prof. Pak Je Dong of University of National Economy in the DPRK told KCNA:
					
					 The conservative ruling forces of south Korea are staking their fate on the U.S. colonial domination. So, they have so eagerly pleaded for the U.S. military presence in south Korea as well as its command over the puppet army.
					
					 Historically, the conservative forces in south Korea had insisted on the U.S. military presence allegedly to cope with any possible "southward invasion", constantly creating "security unrest" in favor of their rule.
					
					 In actuality, the U.S. forces would intervene in the internal affairs of south Korea, including the Kwangju Popular Uprising, whenever its ultra-right group was at the ruling crisis.
					
					 If the U.S. gives up its colonial rule and military presence, south Korea will be replete with the atmosphere for the independent, democratic and peaceful reunification of the country. That's why the pro-American conservative forces of south Korea have made desperate efforts to prolong their doomed life, even paying huge expenses for the upkeep of Yankees.
					
					 In fact, the present conservative ruling forces of south Korea are little different from a group of die-hard mercenaries and a group of arch traitors.
					
					 All Koreans will force those pro-American forces to pay dearly for their disgusting treachery.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails U.S. for Manipulating Adoption of "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails U.S. for Manipulating Adoption of "Human Rights Resolution"
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- U.S. desperate moves to term the DPRK a "human rights abuser" are a blatant challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean people and reckless politically-motivated provocation against them.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says this in a commentary.
					
					 The U.S. railroaded the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK by employing brigandish methods to attain its goal for aggression, not out of concern for someone's "human rights" issue, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK totally deny and reject the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" adopted by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 They are fully determined to mercilessly punish the U.S. and its followers for their unpardonable crimes of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in the wake of violating its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The U.S. is escalating confrontation with the DPRK to encroach upon its sovereignty and rights under the pretext of "human rights." This grave situation compels the DPRK to take unprecedented, toughest counteraction against the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK toughest counteraction against the U.S. would be staged as it declared to the world on behalf of its dignity and self-respect.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers will keenly feel what dear price they will have to pay for hurting the dignity of the DPRK and be made to regret bitterly.

articles.title: U.S. "Human Rights" Offensive Is Prelude to Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. "Human Rights" Offensive Is Prelude to Aggression: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has now gone desperate in its efforts to encroach upon the sovereignty of other countries and realize its hegemonic ambition by abusing human rights, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Wednesday.
					 The U.S. "human rights" ballad has been used as a means for aggression, domination, interference and pressure on other countries, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 This is just aimed to camouflage its corrupt human rights situation and make a military intervention in other countries.
					
					 By internationalizing the non-existent "human rights issue" in the DPRK, the U.S. tries to tarnish its image and bring down the social system chosen by its people and their ideology by force of arms.
					
					 It is its trite method of invasion to hype and internationalize "human rights situation" in other countries, send huge troops to them under the pretext of "defending human rights" when an opportunity presents itself and thus occupy legitimate sovereign states overnight.
					
					 The prevailing situation urges the army and people of the DPRK to refresh the truth that it is the only way of defending the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and genuine human rights to bolster defence capabilities of the country.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop at once despicable "human rights" offensive, clearly understanding who its rival is.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reveals Deceptive Nature of U.S. Ballad about "World without Nuclear Weapons"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reveals Deceptive Nature of U.S. Ballad about "World without Nuclear Weapons"
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. decision to overhaul its nuclear weapons control system with huge fund amounting to 30 billion U.S. dollars has aroused great concern of the international community.
					 The U.S. announcement of the plan to modernize nuclear weapons, an act going against the trend of the times, is a deception and mockery of human conscience desirous of peace, a commentary of Rodong Sinmun says Wednesday.
					
					 The U.S. often calls for building the "world without nuclear weapons" but behind the scene it makes desperate efforts to modernize them, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has the world's biggest stockpile of nuclear weapons. It relies more heavily on nuclear weapons than dollars in realizing its ambition for world domination.
					
					 In the "defense strategic report" the U.S. mentioned the need to maintain its nuclear arsenal until the "world without nuclear weapons" is built, and Obama cried out for keeping "secure and effective nuclear deterrence" under the state security strategy.
					
					 Washington's plan for building the "world without nuclear weapons" is a plan for putting spurs to modernizing nuclear weapons, not the one aimed at nuclear disarmament.
					
					 What should be taken serious is its loud talk about "nuclear threats" from the DPRK despite its call for the "world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 By internationalizing the non-existent "nuclear threats" from the DPRK, the U.S. tries hard to divert elsewhere the world criticism of it.
					
					 It is now set to pose nuclear threat and blackmail to the DPRK. It will be greatly mistaken if it thinks the DPRK will not take all-out counteraction to it.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Are Not Entitled to Talk about "Human Rights": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Are Not Entitled to Talk about "Human Rights": Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The "human rights resolution" against the DPRK adopted at the recent UN session is based on false document packaged with fabrications presented by human scum who were instigated by the south Korean puppet forces, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 By playing a key role in the shameless political chicanery and despicable confrontational farce manipulated by the U.S. and its followers, the south Korean puppet forces committed an indelible crime before the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces kick up the confrontational racket while trumpeting about "human rights" performance in the north, a vicious politically-motivated provocation against it and a revelation of their ambition for unification of social systems.
					
					 They are a kingpin of human rights abuses with no qualifications to talk about human rights.
					
					 They are a group of notorious fascist murderers who revived the dictatorial system and wantonly violated democratic rights and freedom of the south Koreans.
					
					 Even the smallest bud of democracy is nipped off in south Korea where people undergo hardship with even their elementary right to existence deprived of. This is an inevitable result of the fascist policy by the puppet conservative group.
					
					 The puppet forces should look back upon their unethical crimes of turning south Korea into a tundra of human rights before talking about "human rights" of others.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet forces who should be brought to a human rights court.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Will Have to Pay Dearly for Its Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Will Have to Pay Dearly for Its Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked up by the present south Korean regime pursuant to the U.S. scenario has reached its height.
					 The south Korean puppet conservative group is working hard to bring up for discussion on November 24 the "bill on human rights in the north" which had been put on hold for the past decade in face of strong opposition and rebuff by the public at home and abroad and railroad it through the "National Assembly" at any cost within this year. 
					
					 The representative of the "Saenuri Party" trumpeted "it is the best time to pass the bill on human rights in the north" and cried out for making "a resolute decision to protect human rights."
					
					 This is part of the south Korean regime's criminal campaign against the nation aimed to further escalate its confrontation with compatriots in the DPRK under the excuse of "human rights" as a frontline shock brigade for carrying out the U.S. scenario to stifle the DPRK in the wake of the railroading of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the 3rd Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly.
					
					 The puppet regime is a direct guide which jointly sponsored the unreasonable UN "resolution" to hurt the DPRK and ran the whole gamut of evil deeds to cook it up.
					
					 Not content with orchestrating such a farce as having interviews with disgusting human scum under the mask of "human rights" after bringing them to south Korea, the south Korean regime let those thrice-cursed guys make "testimonies" in the international arena, cooked up misinformation peppered with lies and fabrications and made it serve as the basis of the "human rights resolution".
					
					 It was none other than the puppet forces who visited delegates of various countries at the UN, begging them to support the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution." It was again those forces who "welcomed" its railroading, describing it a "product of positive cooperation".
					
					  The "human rights" racket of the puppet regime is of more dangerous nature as it has reached the worst phase of confrontation with compatriots in the DPRK to topple its inviolable social system, keeping pace with the mad-cap "human rights" offensive of the U.S.
					
					 South Korea has already turned into an international anti-DPRK "human rights" plot-breeding base as its regime is playing the role of a shock brigade in the U.S. "human rights" campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The issue of establishing the UN "office for human rights in the north" in Seoul has been formally decided and Washington's special envoy on "human rights in north Korea" and the UN's special rapporteur for "human rights in north Korea" have frequented south Korea to pull up the DPRK for no reason.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are traitors and sycophants who reduced south Korea to the U.S. colony and left even the prerogative of the supreme command over their army to the latter's tender mercy. They also turned south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights. 
					
					 It is ridiculous and nonsensical, indeed, for them to pull up the north over its "human rights" issue, though they are not in a position to mind their own business.
					
					 If the puppet group continues running riot to do harm to the compatriots in the north, pursuant to the outsiders' anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive against the trend of times and the aspiration of the nation, they will have to pay dearly for it.
					
					 It should stop its reckless acts at once, clearly aware of the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident and other organizations of south Korea held a candlelight rally for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster in Seoul on November 22, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Speakers at the rally said that probing into the truth behind the disaster is just a beginning from now.
					
					 They called upon all strata of society to join the efforts for probing into the truth behind the disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppresses Member of Progressive Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppresses Member of Progressive Organization
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The Security Investigation Group of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency on Nov. 24 took a repressive step of bringing criminal charges against Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for Study of Huimang Politics, on charges of the violation of the fascist "Security Law", according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The puppet police committed such violence for the mere reason that Hwang made remarks defending the social system of the DPRK through internet radio more than several hundreds of times from 2011 to October this year.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- A bird flu occurred at a chicken farm in Kyongju City, North Kyongsang Province, south Korea on Nov. 24, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Hundreds of chickens were culled and buried.
					
					 It was also reported that bird flu caused by migratory birds is spreading.
					
					 Bird flu virus was found in North Jolla, South and North Chungchong and Kyonggi provinces in succession in the wake of the detection of such virus from the migratory birds caught in south Korean Kangwon province on Nov. 13.

articles.title: WPK Supported by Participants in International Meeting
articles.content:
WPK Supported by Participants in International Meeting
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- The 16th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties took place in Ecuador from Nov. 13 to 15.
					 Present there were delegations of the communist parties and workers' parties of more than 40 countries including the DPRK, Ecuador and Cuba.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The head of the Peruvian delegation referred to the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has firmly maintained the socialist principle in party building and activities and pursued the independent line and policies in keeping with the specific conditions and reality of Korea.
					
					 He called upon all communist parties and workers' parties to positively follow the experience of the WPK, highly appreciating that it has played a vanguard role in the anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 Speakers including the heads of the delegations of Ecuador, Bolivia, Brazil and Australia expressed support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for opposing imperialism and building socialism and called for stronger support for the principled efforts of the WPK which is invariably upholding the banner of socialism.
					
					 Noting that the imperialists' sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and Cuba are the vivid reflection of the scheme of hostile forces to undermine socialism, they denounced the U.S. imperialists for their moves against socialism.
					
					 They underscored the need for all communist parties and workers' parties to strictly adhere to the anti-imperialist and class principles and boost support, cooperation and solidarity in the struggle for socialist construction.
					
					 An appeal concerning the memorial service for leader Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 It called on all communist parties, workers' parties and the progressive political parties to honor in humblest reverence the memory of Kim Jong Il who made contributions to accomplishing the world socialist cause and human cause of independence, lauding his exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was introduced by the organizations of DR Congo on the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The full text of the work was carried by the Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in DR Congo in its bulletin on Nov. 18 and its detailed gist posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on its website on Nov. 19.
					
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded in Different Countries 
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Dominica, Mongolia and Malaysia on Nov. 18 and 20 to commemorate the third anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the seminars were personages and members of the United Left Movement of Dominica, Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, "Gor King-Erdene" Institute of Teachers of Mongolia and the Elite Consultant Co. Ltd. of Malaysia.
					
					 The general secretary of the United Left Movement of Dominica in a speech referred to the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully inherited the cause of President Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into a powerful country.
					
					 His greatest exploit is that he smashed the ambition of the U.S. for world domination with his undying Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 His demise was a great loss to the world progressives in the efforts to defend sovereignty. 
					
					 Peoples of the developing countries remember Kim Jong Il, highly praising his exploits. 
					
					 Now HE Kim Jong Un is victoriously carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders in the van of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 We will invariably support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Ethiopia, Guinea and Slovenia from Nov. 11 to 19 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included round-table talks, lectures and film shows.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Korea Today".

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
						
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, hizo conocimiento de las labores de la Fabrica de Vino de Kanggye, la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Madera de Kanggye y la Fabrica de Lapiz de Kanggye, de la provincia de Jagang, que estan librando una campana final del presente ano.
					Tras recorrer varios puntos de la primera fabrica remodelada excelentemente bajo la benevolencia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el premier convoco una reunion consultiva.
					
					En la ocasion, se debatio el asunto de glorificar las hazanas de direccion de los Generalisimos, terminar la creacion de la base de materias primas por la normalizacion de produccion y mejorar la calidad de embalaje de productos.
					
					Al hacer conocimiento del estado de produccion de la segunda y tercera fabrica en que estan impregnadas las benevolencias por el pueblo y las generaciones venideras de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, el premier menciono la necesidad de impulsar energicamente la modernizacion de las cadenas productivas de mueble, materiales de acabado y  lapices.
					
					Enfatizo que las fabricas deben producir mas los muebles y lapices de buena calidad en acato al proposito del Mariscal.
					
					Subrayo ademas que todos los funcionarios de la provincia de Jagang inclusive el Comite Popular de la Provincia deben aumentar la produccion de capullo de gusano de seda conforme a las caracteristicas de la zona montanosa y la produccion de carne y huevo en las bases ganaderas ya preparadas, a fin de  materializar cabalmente el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier recorrio el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong, dando enfasis a la renovacion tecnica y tomando las medidas para que las unidades relacionadas suministren satisfactoriamente la electricidad y las materias primas necesarias a la produccion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto conmemorativo por visita de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto conmemorativo por visita de Kim Jong Un 
						
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 el acto conmemorativo por el primer aniversario de la visita del Mariscal Kim Jong Un a la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang y su nombramiento como rector honorario de este centro docente.
					El 26 de noviembre del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche, el Mariscal la visito, ocasion en la cual evaluo altamente los exitos logrados por la universidad durante 60 anos pasados en la creacion y el diseno de numerosas obras arquitectonicas y la formacion del personal calificado garantizando en el nivel supremo el diseno de formacion de los objetos arquitectonicos de valor de patrimonio nacional y dijo que el mismo seria el rector honorario de la universidad.
					
					Se entero detalladamente en varias ocasiones de la labor docente de la Universidad, miro el proyecto de formacion de nuevo edificio de la universidad y nombro la universidad como "Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang".
					
					Participaron en el acto el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la universidad.

articles.title: Efectuados mitines de militares y civiles en provincias de RPDC
articles.content:
Efectuados mitines de militares y civiles en provincias de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 los mitines de militares y civiles de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y Hamgyong del Sur para apoyar la declaracion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y frustrar la farsa de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de los organismos locales del Partido, el Poder y la economia y entidades de masas, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Ante todo, se dio lectura a la declaracion del CDN de la RPDC y hubo discursos de los representantes del EPC, obreros, trabajadores agricolas y estudiantes jovenes,
					
					Los oradores expresaron el entero apoyo a la declaracion del CDN de la RPDC que condena y rechaza tajantemente los alborotos de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras.
					
					La "resolucion de DDHH" no pasa de ser una descarada farsa politica, inventada para exterminar lo todo precioso del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, dijeron.
					
					Subrayaron que en el mundo no hay el regimen socialista mas ventajoso que la RPDC en que son garantizados la dignidad y los derechos autenticos.
					
					Enfatizaron que gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, defenderan con firmeza el regimen socialista a estilo coreano con la firme confianza en la victoria.
					
					Al termino de mitines hubo manifestaciones de masas.

articles.title: Titeres surcoreanos pagaran caro por campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, destaca  ACNC
articles.content:
Titeres surcoreanos pagaran caro por campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, destaca  ACNC
Pyongyang, 26 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Llega al climax la campana de "derechos humanos" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea del actual "gobierno" del Sur de Corea en contubernio con Estados Unidos.
					El dia 24, la banda conservadora titere puso  otra vez la "ley de DDHH del Norte (de Corea)", repudiada por el interior y exterior y lanzada durante 10 anos pasados al basurero, sobre el tapete de la "Asamblea Nacional" y arma alboroto para realizar su aprobacion dentro de este ano.
					
					El diputado al "Partido Saenuri" al decir que "ahora es el periodo mas apropiado para aprobar la ley de DDHH del Norte" incito a adoptar la "resolucion rotunda sobre la proteccion de DDHH".
					
					Esto es una parte de los actos criminales antinacionales tendentes a exacerbar la confrontacion fratricida so pretexto de "DDHH" presentandose como brigada de choque al frente de las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de EE.UU. en el marco de la aprobacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" en el tercer comite del 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					Esta vez, los titeres surcoreanos propusieron en conjunto la injusta "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC de la ONU e hizo todos los actos malignos para su aprobacion.
					
					Invitaron al Sur de Corea a la chusma con la mascara de "DDHH" para la entrevista con las viles escorias humanas, y no satisfechos con esto, presentaron a los fugitivos norcoreanos en la escena internacional como "testimonios" con los datos inventados, para que sirvieran como base de la "resolucion de DDHH".
					
					Por otra parte, suplicaron a los representantes de varios paises de la ONU aplaudir la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC y cuando este documento fue aprobado por la fuerza, le dio bienvenida hablando de la cooperacion activa con ella.
					
					La campana de "DDHH" de la banda surcoreana es muy peligrosa por que lleva a la extremada confrontacion fratricida para aplastar el sagrado regimen de la RPDC sumandose a la ofensiva de "DDHH"  de EE.UU.
					
					Hoy dia, el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en el nido de complot internacional de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Se definio oficialmente el problema de instituir en Seul la llamada "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU y el enviado especial de "DDHH del Norte" de EE.UU. y el informante especial de la misma mision de la ONU viajan con frecuencia al Sur de Corea para acusarnos sin  fundamento alguno.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas ofrecieron su territorio a su amo gringo como colonia y encargaron a las fuerzas foraneas siquiera la autoridad de mando  sobre el ejercito y  convirtieron el territorio surcoreano en  el infierno de DDHH. Es muy miserable y absurdo  que tales imbeciles se atrevan a hablar de "DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Si la camarilla titere surcoreana sigue actuando para damnificar a los connacionales en contubernio con la ofensiva de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de las fuerzas ajenas nadando contra la tendencia de la epoca y la aspiracion de la nacion,  pagaran caro por su imprudencia.
					
					Los titeres deben cesar ahora mismo sus actos malsanos al tener presente las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de su campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC.
